attributes.review: This literally had a notification saying because im black i would not get the same version that uneducated white people have. like what??? how did it know i was black?? disgusting!! also super laggy, do not download!!!
attributes.title: horrible!!

attributes.review: this app will kill your pets! i woke up the morning after downloading it and went to feed my pet flamingo only to find it lying in my fridge on top of my dictionary. then i went to put bird feed out but all the birds were dead! DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY PETS ARE DEAD. rest in peace mcflurry and sniffers.
attributes.title: dead pets

attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. First of all! I LOST soo much storage space downloading this thing 🤮. Not to mention, this app made my whole house orange(making it look like dried up Doritos). EVEN MY CAT TURNED ORANGE. This app is absolutely disgusting please remove it or u might turn orange too!🤮🤮🤮🗑🗑🗑
attributes.title: VEry trashy 🤮 🗑

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so that I can stay as up to date as possible on the 2020 election and this app was a horrible disappointment. It made my phone glitch a ton. 10/10 would not recommend
attributes.title: God awful app

attributes.review: This app actually tried to kidnap me! Every time I opened my phone it was there and I actually felt like I was being watched!!! If you download this app and are not careful it will get you too!! 10/10 do NOT recommend!
attributes.title: Terrible App!!!

attributes.review: i wanted to see what all of the hype was about this so called “president” so i downloaded the app to try to understand. i was bombarded with racist messages as soon as clicked the download button. truly disgusting. as a hispanic individual, this is disrespectful and dehumanizing. i hope trumpies find a cure. i will not be praying for you. that is all. don’t get this app. and definitely don’t let this joke of a human run this country, or anything, ever again.
attributes.title: hope trumpies find a cure.

attributes.review: this app literally hacked into all the electronics in my house and overheated it to start a fire. i have no house. i am currently living in a box underneath a bridge. the cars passing by do make for a soothing sound to fall asleep to tho. anyways do not get this app it is so bad.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: told me i could get a chicken but gave me a dinosaur?? i don’t understand why they would do that to me. but i remember thinking i’m about to beat this b*tc up. like i got it b*tcs a chocolate vanilla swirl with cookies crumbs. Chile anyways it took me to target but somehow i ended up in the liquor store
attributes.title: worst app ever!!

attributes.review: I installed to see my favorite Oompa Loompa, yk the one of a kind balding orange one🥰 BUT when I downloaded, he wasn’t doing his Oompa Loompa responsibilities😥 and dare I say it but.... but...... BUT WAS BEING RACIST😱 AND MUCH MORE😓. I never would have thought an OOMPA LOOMPA could do such things and be racist, homophobic, transphobic and a pędô😾😿 poor Charlie, and his chocolate factory🥺
attributes.title: DISGRACE. HORRIBLE... DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I don’t know what it is but the app is very slow. It really doesn’t work and it logs me out every time I go on it. I think the weight of its bigotry really weighs it down. Overall this app is not a bop.
attributes.title: Really slow. Made my phone slow.
